title: product
description: Definition for a GA4 product / item

affiliation.description: A product affiliation to designate a supplying company or brick and mortar store location

coupon.description: The coupon name/code associated with the item

discount.description: The unit monetary discount value associated with the item

index.description: The index/position of the item in a list

item_category.description: The category of the item. If used as part of a category hierarchy or taxonomy then this will be the first category

item_category2.description: The second category hierarchy or additional taxonomy for the item

item_category3.description: The third category hierarchy or additional taxonomy for the item

item_category4.description: The fourth category hierarchy or additional taxonomy for the item

item_category5.description: The fifth category hierarchy or additional taxonomy for the item

item_list_id.description: The ID of the list in which the item was presented to the user

item_list_name.description: The name of the list in which the item was presented to the user

item_variant.description: The item variant or unique code or description for additional item details/options
examples: The item variant or unique code or description for additional item details/options

location_id.description: The physical location associated with the item

price.description: The monetary unit price of the item, in units of the specified currency parameter
